name: Gregory Aaron THOMAS, Petitioner, v. Lieutenant RADLE, David Diguglielmo, Superintendent, Respondents

parties: Gregory Aaron THOMAS, Petitioner, v. Lieutenant RADLE, David Diguglielmo, Superintendent, Respondents.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 23rd day of August, 2007, the Petition for Review, treated as a Petition for Relief Pursuant to Pa.R.A.P. 123, is denied.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
930 A.2d 1281
Gregory Aaron THOMAS, Petitioner, v. Lieutenant RADLE, David Diguglielmo, Superintendent, Respondents.
No. 100 EM 2007.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Aug. 23, 2007.
